summary:
I didin\'t like the savior\'s hide shoulder, so I made them invisible.

Also made a version containing a chain mail skirt.
descriptionHtml:
Edit: sorry to the 80 first peoples or so to dowload it, there was a missing space in data/textures/armor/savior\'shide. The folder should have been called \'\'savior\'s hide\'\'. It\'s fixed now, enjoy !

It\'s simply a re-texture of the savior\'s hide to make the big ugly shoulder invisible.

I\'ve also made a version adding a short chain mail skirt because I felt the savior\'s hide didn\'t offer enough leg protection.

The shoulderless version work on both male and female, while the chain mail version is female only.

I\'ve made the chain mail skirt version using Saviors Hide Replacer - Female by Daejones.
You can find it here: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1620

You can modify this mod to your heart content, but if you upload it, credits would be nice (as well as sending me a link of your mod so I can check it out)
author: ko_sct

files.name: Shoulderless saviors Hide with chain mail skirt
files.fileName: Shoulderless saviors Hide with chain mail skirt-6514-2.rar
